cleaned_text: Energy Crystal||64||127||16| ¹Spherical. Line of sight is ignored. ²Links to other crystals. Wireless links to other devices are not counted against limit. Energy flows like a fluid, attempting to balance stored energy between linked crystals. The smaller the difference in stored energy, the smaller the transfers. The greater the degree of seperation, the longer the network takes to balance.
